verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm going to walk,
I'm going to walk,
I'm going to walk in the light till Jesus comes
In the light He's brought me to
Walking along just me and you.
I'm going to walk in the light till Jesus comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Apostles going to walk, etc.
Elders going to walk, etc.
Prophets going to walk, etc.
You're going to walk, etc.
Teachers going to walk, etc.
The Family going to walk, etc.
We're all going to walk, etc.
